Articles.Content:
Hi.

I want to try SWdennis's method out about making huge crafts, and I downloaded the mod. I loaded up the game, but the welding button was not there! Is there any way that there's a welding mod like this that is 0.90.0 compatable?

Hi.

I want to try SWdennis's method out about making huge crafts, and I downloaded the mod. I loaded up the game, but the welding button was not there! Is there any way that there's a welding mod like this that is 0.90.0 compatible?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107273-0-90-UbioZur-Welding-Ltd-Continued-2-1-1-%282015-01-14%29

There are restrictions on what you can weld into a single part. In general, that means *one* of a particular thing like a solar panel, reaction wheel, probe core, docking port, multi-way RCS thruster. All lifting surfaces will need to all have the same orientation, etc.
Questions about mod use go in the modding support sub-forum. And so, moved.
Thank you so much! I like how it looks! I'll test it out later. But thanks wuphons!
